description: The best rowhome in town! This brand new corner home has two primary beds each with an ensuite, two additional beds, a den and two more baths. The main floor is an open concept with a spacious foyer, large windows, high ceilings, a modern living room with an elegant fireplace, fabulous powder bathroom for guests, entertainer's kitchen with s/s appliances and a garburator for added convenience. A cute deck with large sliding doors awaits you for you to have your morning coffee. Upstairs a large primary bedroom is attached a spa-like ensuite. Full size laundry, two additional bedrooms, and a spacious main bathroom are located upstairs with views of a serene park. The basement has a large flex space, a second primary bed and ensuite, perfect for a growing family! EV Ready and close to HWY1.
